commit message:
Fix digest string conversion

BigInteger ignores insignificant leading 0's, thus some files fail to verify.

Merge pull request #56 from ce-4/patch-1

Fix digest string conversion in the verify method of the Volume class

Merge pull request #57 from dliw/master

German translation

Merge pull request #58 from ce-4/patch-2

Small fixes in german translation

Check header sanity before reading metadata, show error message toast.

Dictionaries downloaded with command line tools may end up being html
(of error page for example) with .aar extension. Previously no checks
were made, attempt to load metadata was made, sometimes with random
huge value for metadata length which would crash the app with
OutOfMemoryError.
Implement 'Find' action - find text in article
Normalize white space: trim trailing whitespace, untabify, indent with 4 spaces
